headline: Norwegian Cruise Line president leaves company
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line President David Herrera has left the company, with the head of its parent company taking over for now. Harry Sommer, the current president and CEO of Miami-based Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings, which oversees NCL as well as Oceania and Regent Seven Seas, will assume day-to-day responsibilities for the company’s marquee cruise line effective immediately, according to a ...

headline: CCL Stock Rises 34% in 3 Months: Should You Act Now or Hold Steady?
summary: Carnival's 34% rally in three months reflects strong demand, record yields and balance sheet gains. Yet, rising costs and global risks loom.
